configuration.description:
Flexray signaling component test case, full vertical send and receive Send one flexray signal, 'signalToIhu' that will end up in a DEReceiver in the test program flexray_test.cpp which will in turn send back 'signalFromIhu' with the same value as the one sent.
Also restart the VehicleSignalsDaemon(VSD) to test that the MP-VIP communication can recover communication and restart handshake when the sequence number has gotten out of sync.
Smoke test for basic flexray signaling working. Regression test for [ARTINFO-1633] [ARTINFO-1581] [ARTINFO-1609]
